body: Got through three months of hard work with determination!
comments: Congrats! Inspiring to hear you have the certification in hand.
Sounds yummy. Will have to try myself soon.

body: MERN was so worth learning, after I learned handlebars. State was more complicated.
comments: MERN is definitely on my list to learn next. Thanks for the tip.
That's so cool. Happy to hear you have a fur companion. Need pics.

titleAchievement: Crossing off Puerto Rico my Bucket List
body: The tickets have been booked to go to Puerto Rico. It's offical. I;m traveling.
comments: So great to hear. Bet it feels good to achieve your dreams.

body: Finally got to lift more than I ever had done before, and more reps too.
comments: See, hard work does pay off. Great job.

titleAchievement: First 5K down, now to plan my 10k
body: Just ran my first 5k on Saturday, now I'm pumped to run my next run, a 10k.
comments: Way to go! You got this.

body: Last night I made these air fryer salmon bowls and it was just like I went out to eat.
comments: Makes me hungry just thinking about it. Please send photos. Gotta recreate it.
